content: gilmore girls coffee cozy brings back the memories of luke s cafe this reusable cozy is small enough to fit in your purse so you always have it with you the cozy makes a great gift it knits up in an afternoon or evening using only 43 yds of yarn the coffee cozy is a great way to experiment with yarns stitches and colorwork before beginning a large project choose your preferred small circumference knitting method we ve paired this craft or that comfy worsted minis with rico metallic thread or choose another carry along thread to bedazzle the coffee cozy it s kind of like potato chips bet you can t just make one
